subject: PSA: This email contains dog photos & puns
body_text:
Hey there, friend–
Doug’s very best friends – Scout and Dakota Jones – are taking their begging from the kitchen table and bringing their pleas to the people. They’ve been promised a trip to Washington, DC if their dad wins his election in November, and they’re asking you to do everything you can to make sure that happens.
In July, almost 60,000 of you pitched in to send Scout and Dakota to Washington (and yes, to re-elect Doug Jones) – and they are thrilled. So thrilled that they wanted to thank you by introducing you to some of their best friends working on the campaign here in Alabama – they heard you like that sort of thing.
Send us pictures of your furry friends to @DogJones4Senate on Twitter, too! Everybody at campaign HQ – two-legged and four-legged – would love to meet them!
And, if you can, pitch in for Scout and Dakota (Doug, too) – because Washington needs more loyalty, goodwill, and catching – not dropping – the ball.
Don’t let your furry friend get caught at the dog park not making a political statement for unity and progress! Get your Doug Jones for Senate bandana here >>
Thanks again from all of us here at Team Do(u)g!
PAID FOR BY DOUG JONES FOR SENATE COMMITTEE
PO Box 131025 Birmingham, AL 35213
This message was sent to: [[EMAIL_REDACTED]].
Contributions or gifts to Doug Jones for Senate Committee are not deductible for federal income tax purposes.
An individual or non-multicandidate federal PAC may contribute a maximum of $2,800 per election. A multi-candidate Federal PAC may contribute a maximum of $5,000 per election. The 2020 Primary and 2020 General elections are separate elections. Contributions from corporations, labor organization treasury funds, foreign nationals, and federal government contractors are prohibited. Contributions must be made from the contributor’s own funds, not those of another and contributors may not be reimbursed by any other person or entity.
Federal law requires us to use our best efforts to collect and report the name, mailing address, occupation and name of employer of individuals whose contributions exceed $200 in an election cycle.
We believe that emails are a crucial way for our campaign to stay in touch with supporters like you. However, if you’d prefer to receive fewer emails, you can click here. If you would like to unsubscribe, click here. Thanks for your support!
name: Lulu Seikaly

Getting Democrats to the polls is the most effective way to win elections -- and increasing Democratic Voter Turnout is the only way to defeat Donald Trump.
Barack Obama: Elections matter. Voting matters.
Our country is going through dark times. But we can’t stop fighting for progress when it matters most. We can’t sit idly by while Republicans rip apart our Democracy. We have a moral obligation to fight for ourselves, our grandchildren, and our future.

subject: Almost there
body_text:
Friends — I have a meeting with Mike in an hour to tell him how much we raised. I’d really like to tell him that we’ve hit our goal — but I just can’t do that yet.
At this point, we’re about $2,254 away from our End-of-Month goal. So, I’m turning to you to help close the money gap today before I meet with Mike. Can I count on you to chip in a quick triple-matched donation to help us flip this battleground district?

I’m hoping, if you can, that you’ll chip in a donation today so I can tell Mike we hit our End-of-Month goal. Can I count on you to pitch in a triple-matched donation so I can tell Mike the good news?

from_name: Repro Rights Alert via Team Moore
subject: 71% of Americans
body_text:
​
​
​
Remember — 71% of Americans believe Roe v. Wade should not be overturned by the Supreme Court — and that number includes Republicans too.
That’s why it’s so atrocious that Rep. Pete Olson would go against SO many Americans to try to tear down Roe v. Wade. He joined 206 other members of Congress to petition the court to “reconsider” Roe.
But here’s the thing — our rights aren’t going to be torn down because we have a true champion running for Congress: Nyanza Moore.
Showing her support is the best thing we can do to tell Pete Olson that his actions are unacceptable. He’s not running for Congress again so we have a genuine opportunity for change.
Instead — we can uplift a legal mind who KNOWS the right thing to do and is standing on the RIGHT side of history when it comes to abortion rights.  Chip in $5 immediately >>
Chip in $36 immediately >>
Chip in $50 immediately >>
Chip in $100 immediately >>
Chip in $250 immediately >>

subject: Here’s the truth
body_text:
Not interested? Unsubscribe Here
Hi there, Fellow Conservative,
From the moment President Trump was elected, Democrats have been clear about their intentions. They want to take back the White House, grow their Majority in the House, retake the Senate, and NOW reshape the Supreme Court for generations to come to push their liberal agenda.
Once the President took office, their agenda has become more radical than ever before. I’m shocked to see leaders on the left surrender to the liberal mobs’ demands to:
* Dismantle and defund the police
* Implement socialist policies like the Green New Deal that place a massive burden on the American taxpayer
* Appease violent looters and rioters who are holding cities across America hostage
* Erase American history by removing monuments to our Founding Fathers – sometimes with brute force
* And BLOCK the President and the Senate from our Constitutional duties to fill the Supreme Court vacancy
The radical left is closer than ever before to achieving their goal of total control. It’s up to grassroots fighters like YOU to help us gather the resources and strength to stop them!
Emergency 6X-MATCHING is unlocked for all gifts to defeat the radical left!
DONATE 6X-MATCHED $500
DONATE 6X-MATCHED $250
DONATE 6X-MATCHED $100
DONATE 6X-MATCHED $50
DONATE 6X-MATCHED $25
Before you delete this email, I implore you to reconsider. Your 6X-MATCHED gift of $10, $25, or even $50 today will make all the difference in the fight to defend the conservative principles and policies that the radical left wants to destroy. Are you going to let them succeed?
If you donate ANY amount before 11:59 PM tonight, you’ll MAKE 6X THE IMPACT in the final weeks leading up to Election Day! Can I count on you to step up before it’s too late?
Thank you for your generous help today.
Mitch McConnell
6X-MATCH >> DONATE NOW

name: Elect Democratic Women

subject: The EMILY's List Senate Digest
body_text:
This email is long, but full of good information about our plan to flip the Senate. Be sure to read until the end!
Hi there,
These numbers are REALLY exciting >>
We only need to flip 4 seats to take back the Senate in November! That's it! A flipped Senate means protecting pro-choice ideals on the Supreme Court, taking back the gavel from Mitch McConnell, and getting dozens of bills on the Senate floor that have stalled out under Republican leadership — and that's just the beginning. Donate $3 now to help flip the Senate!
Our Senate Women >>
Flipping the Senate is a huge priority for EMILY's List in 2020. And of course, we don't want just anyone to flip the Senate — we want pro-choice Democratic women to do it! We've already endorsed 5 women for the Senate: 2 pro-choice champions we MUST re-elect, and 3 women running to flip seats from Republican control (with more endorsements on the way).
Incumbents: Jeanne Shaheen (NH) and Tina Smith (MN)
RED-to-BLUE Flips: Barbara Bollier (KS), Sara Gideon (ME), and Theresa Greenfield (IA)
Donate $3 today to help elect all 5 of our endorsed Senate candidates.
Now for the bad news...
As you know, Republican senators remain committed to pushing an extreme anti-choice agenda that hurts women. All told, 39 Republican senators signed an amicus brief to the Supreme Court last week recommending that Roe v. Wade be overturned. We had already put 3 of them ON NOTICE for their past votes against women and families!
Donate $3 to help replace Sens. John Cornyn (TX), Thom Tillis (NC), and Joni Ernst (IA) with pro-choice Democratic women.
With the first primaries coming right up, it's all eyes on the Senate!
Donate $3 today to help pro-choice Democratic women flip the Senate:
[[URL REDACTED]]
Thanks for all you do,
the EMILY's List team
# EMILY's List is a community of over five million members that helps elect pro-choice Democratic women to office.
Paid for by EMILY's List [[URL REDACTED]] and not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee.
1800 M Street NW, Suite 375N, Washington, DC 20036
